name: BCUK HIGH: Skipping Class
description:
BCUK HIGH: Skipping class – is a short visual novel dating sim where players take on the role of one of two male students the day of the big school skip.

Players can customize the short story how they see fit, will the skip with the new kid at school or avoid the who thing.

The game is loosely based around the life account of an indecent several members of the BattleCattleUK stream team experienced at a convention. In which two members skipped off together.

The game features three members from battlecattle heavily fictionilized Aravelle, Sulyspa and ShadowStalker. And features the art of PinkMonster0.

This game was made as part of a youtube series I put on called the devtastic voyage in which I took viewer throughout the design and development process.

It is a fan game so I wont be charging anything for it but donations are welcome if you have the spare coin and what to see future weird games like this.
